website_summaries.verdict: Lovely little gnome that will look great in almost any garden or bird feeding area.
pros: Adorable garden-appropriate theme with bright colors
Gnome's sunflower goes nicely among bird feeders
cons: Some reports of him falling over when placed on uneven ground

customer_reviews.title: Big on Cuteness
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is cute and brightens the garden. It arrived in good packaging. There's some weight to it, but it is still not heavy enough to withstand a gust of wind, for example. So, we glued it onto a heavy block to help secure in place. I am rating this four stars because I think the price could be a little less for the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivz

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but very small for the price. I got better prices at the local nursery, Lowe's and Home Depot. They should show the size clearly so you are not disappointed. I got them $14.99 elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Bard

customer_reviews.title: Sammy Swinging Gnome
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as scheduled & packaged properly. I had this item a few years ago & loved it. I do not remember what happened to the other one so I found & ordered through Amazon. This Swinging Gnome is a must for any yard decoration setup. I have Sammy swinging from the center of my windmill & have hung Alfie the Acrobat Swinging Gnome to Sammy's log. No falls or spills yet as the 2 just sway back & forth in the wind. A little costly but unique. I consider it worth the purchase as I could not find Sammy anywhere locally.
customer_reviews.author: Phil S.

customer_reviews.title: Just Gnoming Around!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is adorable and bright. I have him sitting outside our door with birds seeds. He greets each visitor with such "happiness". He is not as heavy as I'd like but I added a few stones around him and he should stay in place from any winds.
customer_reviews.author: 80sFan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: because of his weight he fell over and broke within a week. Flimsy construction.
customer_reviews.author: TravelFamily

customer_reviews.title: Love the gnome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my gnome! The box he came in was very well wrapped and protective of him. Wish I purchased him sooner so I could have enjoyed him in the warmer months. Read the instructions. It’s very cold now and he had to be put away for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Darling guy. My grandkids love to put things in his sunflower. Has held up very well to full sun. I wrote my review a couple years after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bero

customer_reviews.title: Isn't it supposed to be bigger?
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger but all in all it's not a bad product.. looks like it can take a beating from kids and animals alike.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Patton

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced low quality
customer_reviews.text: This statue is cute but WAY overpriced. Very light and very small. I was very disappointed and would not buy again, you can find cheaper gnomes of much better quality elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: He's Cute
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is adorable and was very much appreciated as a gift. He arrived packed in styrofoam in perfect condition. He's going to stand near the front door ... inside so someone doesn't make off with him.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Budd

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, nice artistry, good weight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece. It sets on a pedestal in my bird bath. I like to put bird seed in the sunflower. The colors are vibrant and it’s heavy enough not to blow over in the wind. Seeing it outside my window brings me joy.
customer_reviews.author: TFrancis

customer_reviews.title: Just like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Colors are just as brilliant as the pics. A little smaller than expected but it does say only 11" tall...no chips or issues with paint at all.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This gnome is one of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect. I bought it to enhance my garden, but I like it so well that I may keep it indoors. I will think about it!
customer_reviews.author: Carma

customer_reviews.title: Cute gnome birdfeeder!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the old kids series David the Gnome, so I got him one for the garden that looks like David holding a sunflower since we also grow sunflowers. I love that the sunflower is also a bird feeder. Good quality and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I have many Toscano Gnomes, and I enjoy having conversations with them and appreciate their wisdom. Scott A Miller Tent-Cabin Maker Totally Unique Cabins The North American Tent-Cabin Company
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love my gnome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted since my husband ran over my first one with the snow plow
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love mine it's a nice size and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: CMyers

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it
customer_reviews.text: It's beautifully done. Good size. It packed safe and came quick.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. I put it out in the garden. I love the bright colors and cheerful design.
customer_reviews.author: George-Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gnome for any garden
customer_reviews.text: Love my little Brown Gnome. It was well packed, came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kazren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The Gnome represents cherished memories for my daughter. I bought this for her Birthday. The Gnome for the two of us going to the cinema to watch "Gnomio and Juliet",Sammy for her sister that has passed and the Sunflower for her dream wedding . This brings a smile to our faces every time we see it. #makingmemoriesdaughterbestfriendfamily
customer_reviews.author: Trina(Strauss)Glass

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture and exactly what I wanted. Now sitting in my garden and the birds and squirrels seem to enjoy also. There is enough weight where it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: JerryK

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: I'm am very pleased with it. Delivery and packing was great. Really looks good in front of my house
customer_reviews.author: Annette C Drzewiecki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swinging Gnome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A good size and weight (not hollow plastic). Looks great in my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kirtley

customer_reviews.title: Makes verne troyer look like godzilla
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this product is way smaller than the picture, I may as well put a heman action figure in my garden
customer_reviews.author: Dick jammin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Bought as a gift for someone who just redid their backyard patio.
customer_reviews.author: R. Riegel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gnome
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gnome. Colors are a little dull compared to the picture but nothing a little paint can't improve.
customer_reviews.author: dawn o.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gnome
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute gnome. My German Shepherd also likes it and runs around the yard with it in his mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Delightful garden gnome
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a friend for Christmas and she loved it. It will not only look great in her garden but it also doubles as a bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rush

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, vibrant colors, seems durable. Such a sweet addition to the garden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my gnome
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I love my gnome. Makes my garden look even nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen174

customer_reviews.title: cute beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like him very much. He looks very cute, but the workmanship is not perfect. Fortunately, I saw him at the first sight. I hope he can bring me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Laney

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates him!
customer_reviews.text: Sits at the front door greeting all of our friends
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Carr

customer_reviews.title: Gnarly Gnome!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's biggest wish for his birthday was a garden gnome. This fit the bill and he was delighted.
customer_reviews.author: camillaB

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have in a tree but colors and rope don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Colors faded to sickly and the rope of the swing broke after a couple seasons in the tree, but the gnome itself survived likely being blown into branches and the fall when its rope broke.
customer_reviews.author: R L H

customer_reviews.title: Details are great.
customer_reviews.text: Eye catching colors & details. Looks really cute on my deck! Would make a great gift also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. Not a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Reckenwald

customer_reviews.title: Good crafted / well liked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend as she loves gnomes. Very good crafted. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in westland, Mi

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN TOSCANO
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SWINGING SAMMY AND HE IS HAPPY IN THE TREE IN MY GARDEN. PEOPLE STOP AND LOOK AT HIM. THIS COMPANY IS G-R-E-A-T, LOVE THEM AND THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE IS TEN STEPS ABOVE THE REST. I PLAN ON DOING BUSINESS WITH THEM IN THE VERY NEAR FUTURE. THANK YOU DESIGN TOSCANO, YOUR A PLEASURE TO DO BUSINESS WITH VERY RARE IN THIS DAY AND AGE.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE CARDISH

customer_reviews.title: a great choice
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these gnomes and they were at an exceptionally good price. You won't be sorry if you purchase this pair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, great quality and perfect! My mom had it hanging in her tree the next day
customer_reviews.author: SMW2700

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute in my garden of gnomes :0)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money due to quick fading :(
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable when you first get him! However, I purchased Sammy on May 4, 2016. I haven't even had him for a whole year yet and he's already very faded. :( See pic. He's definitely not worth the nearly $48 that I paid for him. He's in a spot where he barely gets hit by the sun. He's also against a wall, so most rain gets blocked from the top of our gutters that hang over our porch. I'm going to try and repaint him with some outdoor paint, which means even more money out of my pocket. >:-( ~Sherrie
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Gnome found home.  Best Spring purchase yet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our garden or deck. Brightens up the place. Always wanted one. My gnome is holding my fave flower - sunflower.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Paradiso

customer_reviews.title: My mother in law will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. My mother in law will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christa & Missy Bazen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable beyond words
customer_reviews.text: Adorable beyond words! Painted resin items in general will not withstand the elements so I knew better than to hang this out in the weather. He hangs on one of our covered porches of our log home. On the wall, from one of those cast iron hangers folks use for hanging flower baskets from. Too cute for words! The twine rope may be a bit sketchy, but simple, cheap and easily changed if need be. You can't help but smile when you walk by him...and anything that brings a quick smile is a GOOD thing! Have a great day...
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: perfect addition to my yard
customer_reviews.text: This little guy looks awesome in my backyard swinging from a tree hanging over my fish pond. Love it! Quality is fabulous and easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Sunflower Gnome...so bright and cheery
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and bright colors...Love my Gnomes....great for my garden....front garden. ALong with my Gnome Crossing sign..great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Sea Otter Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Sammy Gnome
customer_reviews.text: This little guy was cutier in person, it was everything I hoped for and more, Hes so cute in the Tulip tree, a very good accent to my back yard :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's was a gift! My friend loves this little knome!
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looked great until the kids decided to run over it and destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

product_meta.title: Design Toscano Sunflower Sammy Garden Gnome Birdfeeder Statue, 11 Inch, Polyresin, Full Color
product_meta.description: Style:Sunflower SammyOffering up a magical forest sunflower, elfin Sammy is a vintage garden gnome sculpture with all the charm of a mythical fairytale fantasy! Our folk elf collectible pixie statue is cast in quality designer resin and hand painted with more than enough imagination for any woodland sprite. This cute and kitsch elf statue is a collectible figurine to optionally fill with garden birdseed and another friendly garden statue from Design Toscano. 6"Wx6½ "Dx11½ "H. 2 lbs.
feature_bullets: GARDEN GNOME BIRD FEEDER - Attract birds to your yard with our garden gnomes statue who's ready to assist with sunflower bird feeder in hand!
GARDEN GNOMES - True to tradition, our garden gnome statue with his pointed hat and burly gnome beard makes a great gift for lawn gnome collectors
HIGH-QUALITY - Hand-cast using real crushed stone bonded with durable designer resin, our fairy garden gnomes are topped with UV resistant paint
DESIGN TOSCANO GNOME - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this cute nome statue makes a perfect gift for home, lawn or garden
Our perfectly sized lawn gnomes figurines measure 6"Wx6½"Dx11½"H. 2 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars217 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
